long_description: Sporting a built-in mic, the vividly colored URBANEARS Kransen earbuds deliver precise and powerful bass tones in an ergonomic design that stays anchored in your ears. Rubber housing and fabric/thermoplastic elastomer cord with 3.5mm stereo plug help eliminate sound distortions caused by friction. The URBANEARS Kransen earbuds snap together, allowing you to carry them around your neck when they're not in use.
short_description: Sporting a built-in mic, the vividly colored URBANEARS Kransen earbuds deliver precise and powerful bass tones in an ergonomic design that stays anchored in your ears.
